reviews.review_msg: He's the worst professor I've ever had. If you skip class you will definitely lose marks as there are the pop-up quizzes which he takes after the break.

BEST STATS professor EVER! Take her you wont regret it, I was worried it was going to be a super hard course since everybody said Statistics is hard, but it was the complete opposite. The best class Ive taken in university. Everyone needs to teach like her. Literally the best.

Amazing professor, take her for Stats and you wont be disappointed. Keeps everything clear and concise. Midterms and exams have no surprises whatever you learn in class is on the exams so you will be very well prepared just by doing the class work. Has great practice resources, guaranteed A if you do the assignments, which she provides answers.

Very sweet prof but extremely hard to understand the lectures/ powerpoints. Just rushes through them too fast and spends A LOT of time of non testable material. Would not take again if it weren't for the fact that she is an extraordinarily forgiving marker. Most of my answer were wrong/ off but I would never score lower than 75%
Great teacher! Takes her time to make sure you understand the material and makes it easy for you to do well in the class. Highly recommend!
